cause.description:
Have you ever been confronted at the mall or the movies by a religion preaching missionary trying to lure you into a youth group or convert you with their pamphlets of biblical scripture and nonesense you really don't want to hear?
People who seek religion will find it, stop trying to force it upon people.
1. Stop forcing religion
cause.mission: Stop the world wide effort to convert
cause.name: I don't want your pamphlets
